verbs.description: [V: search] [ARGM-LOC: underway] [ARG1: for missing hiker] the sacramento police department is asking the public for help locating a man who reportedly went hiking to an unknown location over the weekend bradford dozier 55 was last seen in sacramento on saturday morning as he was heading to a hike according to a tuesday news release from the sacramento police department dozier car was discovered sunday at the evergreen trailhead in alpine county but it remains unclear if he was hiking on that alpine county sheriffs office sacramento alpine county california alpine county bradford dozier sacramento police department alpine county sheriff office
